title: Emerald Kundan Chandbali - 'Paccha' Pearl Latkan Earrings
materials: Cultured Pearls. Hyderabadi Polish for lasting shine.
features: Intricately crafted Kundan setting arranged in a Chandbali (crescent moon) design. Features delicate filigree work reminiscent of traditional Telugu jewelry. The emerald simulants are pear-cut and bezel-set, accented by dazzling Kundan stones. A lustrous pearl latkan adds a graceful touch.
colors: and Creamy White (Pearl). The green and gold pairing is a classic South Indian auspicious combination.
occasions: and cultural events. Also suitable for contemporary parties and elegant evenings.
description: A stunning blend of traditional South Indian design and contemporary elegance. The radiant emeralds and luminous pearls create a captivating contrast. Lightweight and comfortable to wear, these earrings are a timeless investment and a cherished addition to any jewelry collection. The meticulous Hyderabadi Polish ensures lasting brilliance.
